lore: Although a Moss Golem will never disobey an order from the Mage to whom it belongs, it prefers to live in the depths of a forest, where it can stay completely still and blend with its environment. If it hears the sound of wood yielding to the steel of an axe, it will open its eyes and start moving with the sole purpose of destroying the one who dared damage its home.
menagerieDialog: (It's so still that you're not even sure it's still alive.)
(This creature has the best of intentions, but it always seems to be clumsily knocking things over.)
(Perhaps someday, you'll be able to take the time to teach it how to talk.)
(Its facial expressions are difficult to read. You can't help but think that it's judging you sometimes.)
name: Moss Golem
